_header: Saint Mark speaks in our gospel
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4690.
_description: Gospel for the Twelfth Sunday after Trinity in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte marke in oure gospell spellisOf cristis lawe and vs þus
                    tellis…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…We mai be sikir of heuene medeOure lorde ihesu vs thidir lede
                    amen .
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Mark seiþ in vre gospelI rede ȝe here what he wol
                    tel…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…We may beo siker of heuene medeVr lord Ihesu þidere vs
                    lede. Amen
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Marke sais in þis godspelleAls I til ȝowe thenk ac
                    telle…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…he may be sekire of heuene medeNowe ihesu crist til þat
                    blisse vs lede
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica xxiia post festum trinitatis secundum Marcum (p.
                    262)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Mark seyth in oure GospelleI rede ȝe here what I wile
                    tellehe seyth crist com fro a cuntre…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…Ihesu crist vs alle to þat ioye bringeamen I rede we
                    alle now singe
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica 12a post festum sancte trinitatis Euangelium
                        secundum Marcum (f. 162v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Saynt marke spekys in oure gospellOf crystys sawe and vs gan
                    tell…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…We may be syker of heuen medeOur lord ihesu þeder vs
                    lede
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
Dominica duodecima post trinitatem secundum Marcum (f.
                        111v)

SEint Mark seiþ in vre gospelleI rede ȝe here what I wol
                    telle…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…We may be siker of heuene medeVre lord Ihesus þidur vs
                    lede. Amen
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title: Exiens Ihesu de finibus tyri & sy (f. 7vb)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint marke in our gospell spellisOf crist sawe and þus vs
                    tellis…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…We may be siker of heuen medeOure lorde ihesu vs thider
                    lede

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt marke spekes in oure gospellMede [sic] ȝe here
                    what yt wyll tell…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…we may be sykyr of heuen medeoure lorde Ihesu þider vs
                    spede

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint marc spekyth in oure gospellI rede we hire whate hit woll
                    tell…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…We may be sikkyr off heuynnys medeOure loueryd ihesu
                    þiddyr vs lede
